segments.text: Good morning , Sir . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m going to England by flight BE987 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 10:00 AM . When am I supposed to check in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: we are checking in . May I have your ticket and your health certificate and your luggage please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you keeping the small bag as carry-on luggage , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must weigh that as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your luggage is two pounds over . I ’ m afraid They'll be in excess luggage charge , Sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is your luggage check Which You must show when you disembark at your destination and here is your boarding pass and your ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , please wait until your flight is called . There's about twenty-five minutes to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m a little nervous . I ’ Ve never flown before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There ’ s nothing at all to worry about . Once you are in the air , it ’ s just like sitting at your sitting room . It ’ s going to be a very pleasant flight .
segments.speaker: S1
